content:
GitHub rolled out a feature to set the open graph image of the repo.
https://twitter.com/natfriedman/status/1118590385180200961

You can now set a custom open graph image on a repo that will be used as a social preview, in Slack unfurls, etc. Next step is to make this settable by adding a file to the repo. Enjoy! :rainbow: https://twitter.com/natfriedman/status/1118590385180200961/photo/1

- Nat Friedman (@natfriedman)
nice! any ideas on what ours should be?

Our current OG image looks decent. So we don't have to change now I think.
https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/sharing/?q=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fzulip%2Fzulip
Posted the link mostly because there was a discussion on setting custom OG image before :)
